page.title: 11RADIO CLYDE
page.content: {RADIO CLYDE}is now in its eleventh year of broadcasting.In December 1983 they moved into their 2.5 million pound radio station in the{CLYDEBANK {BUSINESS PARK}.They have 2 million listeners every week .They broadcast to West and Central Scotland and provide useful road survey reports by means of their helicopter,which is paid for by{Maxwell House}in a sponsorship deal .Apart from being the most successful{Independent Local {Radio Station}in Britain it is the only one with a helicopter and the only one in Europe with a swimming pool. {CLYDEBANK}has benefited greatly since {RADIO CLYDE} has moved to the BUSINESS PARK.Radio Clyde now offers more jobs in the future for { {CLYDEBANK}.
